title: Nithari killings case: CBI set to approach Supreme Court against acquittal of Pandher and Koli
comments: Wait, I thought they were dead. Weren't they already sentenced...I was a kid when this came out how the fuck is this still going on at courts?
They were freed by High Court on the basis of lack of evidence.
